mapper.insert:
insert into TA_SP_APPROVE_INFO (rights_code,rights_id,approve_id,approve_code,parent_code,parent_name,approve_name,area_code,org_id,org_name,type_code,trans_type,approve_source,approve_properties,transact_level,min_seq,min_explain,serve_object,theme_type,life_concern,is_self_system,is_batch,is_specific,is_faq,is_self_certificate,is_web_consult,is_synergy,is_government_project,approve_state,is_unify_accept,is_city_open_do,is_elsewhere_do,lastupdate_time,version_num,remark,is_charge,is_send,is_intermediary_services,intermediary_services,services_id,is_valid,is_inwindow,naturalperson_type,certification_type,scene_type,onlinebid_address,is_most_runonce)
select #{entity.rightsCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.rightsId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.approveId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.approveCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.parentCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.parentName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.approveName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.areaCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.orgId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.orgName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.typeCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.transType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.approveSource,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.approveProperties,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.transactLevel,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.minSeq,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.minExplain,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.serveObject,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.themeType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.lifeConcern,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isSelfSystem,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isBatch,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isSpecific,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isFaq,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isSelfCertificate,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isWebConsult,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isSynergy,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isGovernmentProject,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.approveState,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isUnifyAccept,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isCityOpenDo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isElsewhereDo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastupdateTime,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.versionNum,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.remark,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isCharge,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isSend,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isIntermediaryServices,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.intermediaryServices,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.servicesId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isValid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isInwindow,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.naturalpersonType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.certificationType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.sceneType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.onlinebidAddress,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isMostRunonce,jdbcType = VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.select: select a.approve_id,a.approve_code,a.approve_name from TA_SP_APPROVE_INFO a where a.ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
